ticket.title: Improper SQLite escaping
ticket.original-body:
rails (2.2.2) sqlite3-ruby (1.2.4)
I simply update one string attribute of my object, then call save!.
/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activerecord-2.2.2/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/abstract_adapter.rb:188:in `log': SQLite3::SQLException: unrecognized token: "' (ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid)
The full dump is attached.
